basics.name: Francesco Fortunato
basics.label: Master in Engineering in Computer Science
basics.summary: A recent graduate with a Master's Degree in Engineering in Computer Science from Sapienza Università di Roma, with a deep passion for the Internet of Things, telecommunications, software development, machine learning, and artificial intelligence.

work.name: Elezioni Europee
work.summary: Served as the President of the electoral committee during the European Elections in Rome.

work.name: Elezioni Regionali
work.summary: Served as the Secretary of the electoral committee during the Regional Elections in Castrovillari.

work.name: Cinema Atomic Cafè
work.summary: Worked as a cinema attendant and usher, assisting customers, selling tickets, and snacks.

projects.name: PaaT - Pet as a Thing
projects.summary: An IoT-based pet tracking system utilizing an ESP32 Heltec LoRa v2 and GPS module to track pets' movements. This system allows pet owners to monitor their pets' location, view their movement history, and receive alerts when they leave a designated area.

projects.name: Laser-Based Collision Avoidance System
projects.summary: A sophisticated collision avoidance system for robotic applications, developed as part of my Bachelor's thesis. The system enhances robot safety and prevents collisions using laser-based technology.
